name: Snake 64
overview: Snake 64 (Slippery Sid on the UK cassette tape, and Slange 64 in Norway) is a snake game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Wayne Turner and published in the following: - 64 Tape Computing No. 03 (1984/08-09) / a.k.a. "Slippery Sid" on tape - In Norway as Slange 64 in 64 Tape Computing Nr. 2
